price: De Quem é a soberania dos céus e da terra. E Allah, sobre todas as cousas, é Testemunha.
arabic: ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ شَهِيدٌ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: alladhī lahu mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wal-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin shahīdun
